2+1.name: NIGHTCRAWLER
2+1.sig_info: Nightcrawler’s unique heritage, coupled with his X-Men training allows him to switch combat mode 0.30 seconds faster. Additionally, anytime he strikes an Instant Bleed, he gains 12.45 to 29.05 increased Attack for 7 seconds.
